name: Acid Splash
description: A bubble of acid splashes on a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

name: Blade Ward
description: You extend your hand and shield yourself with a shimmering field. Until the start of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Bone Chill
description: You cause a creature to experience intense cold. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 cold damage.

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range. Each light appears as a glowing sphere of light, and you can move them up to 60 feet each round.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature you can see. Make a ranged spell attack, and on a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.

name: Fire Bolt
description: A tiny ball of fire streaks toward a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack, and on a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage.

name: Friends
description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile to you.

name: Guidance
description: You touch a willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

name: Light
description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. It sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

name: Mage Hand
description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action.

name: Minor Illusion
description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range. The illusion lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it.

name: Poison Spray
description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range, and a puff of noxious gas sprays from your palm. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

name: Produce Flame
description: A flickering flame appears in your hand. You can use it to make a ranged spell attack against a creature within 30 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack, and on a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

name: Resistance
description: You touch one willing creature. The target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice.

name: Sacred Flame
description: A flame-like radiance descends on a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage.

name: Shillelagh
description: You touch a club or a quarterstaff. The weapon becomes magical, and its damage die changes to 1d8. The spell ends if you cast it again.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: You reach out and deliver a shock of electricity. Make a melee spell attack, and on a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power. You create one of the following effects: causing flames to flicker, doors to open, or your voice to boom.

name: Thorn Whip
description: You create a long vine whip covered in thorns and lash out at a creature you can see. Make a melee spell attack, and on a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage.

name: True Strike
description: You point at a target, and the target gains a mystical sense of your aim. You have advantage on your first attack roll against the target.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

name: Animal Friendship
description: You can convince a beast that you mean it no harm. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration.

name: Armour of Agathys
description: A protective magical force surrounds you, manifesting as a shimmering aura. You gain temporary hit points, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes cold damage.

name: Arms of Hadar
description: You evoke the power of Hadar, the Dark Hunger. Tendrils of dark energy burst from you and batter all creatures within range. They must make a Strength saving throw or take necrotic damage.

name: Bane
description: You reach out and bestow a debilitating curse upon up to three creatures. They must make a Charisma saving throw or suffer a penalty to their attack rolls and saving throws.

name: Bless
description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls or saving throws.

name: Burning Hands
description: A thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw or take fire damage.

name: Charm Person
description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration.

name: Chromatic Orb
description: You create an orb of energy, choosing a type of energy (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder), and hurl it at a creature you can see within range.

name: Colour Spray
description: You blast a dazzling array of colored light at creatures in a cone. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 round.

name: Command
description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn.

name: Compelled Duel
description: You compel a creature within range to duel you. It must make a Wisdom saving throw or be forced to focus its attacks on you.

name: Create or Destroy Water
description: You create or destroy water. You can create up to 10 gallons of clean water or destroy up to 10 gallons of water within range.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Disguise Self
description: You make yourself appear as another person. You can change your appearance to look like someone else of your size.

name: Dissonant Whispers
description: You whisper a discordant melody that only one creature you can see within range can hear. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage and move away from you.

name: Divine Favour
description: Your weapon is imbued with divine energy. You gain a bonus to damage rolls for the duration.

name: Enhance Leap
description: You magically enhance your jumping ability. For the duration, you can jump higher and further than normal.

name: Ensnaring Strike
description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack, a mass of entangling vines wraps around it, restraining the target.

name: Entangle
description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square. Creatures in the area must make a Strength saving throw or be restrained.

name: Expeditious Retreat
description: You take the Dash action as a bonus action on each of your turns for the duration.

name: Faerie Fire
description: You outline creatures in glowing faerie fire. Any creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in light, giving advantage to attacks against it.

name: False Life
description: You gain temporary hit points that last for the duration.

name: Feather Fall
description: You slow the fall of up to five falling creatures within range. They descend gently to the ground without taking damage.

name: Find Familiar
description: You summon a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form. It can assist you in various ways.

name: Fog Cloud
description: You create a 20-foot-radius cloud of fog that heavily obscures the area within it.

name: Goodberry
description: You create up to ten berries, which provide nourishment and healing when eaten.

name: Grease
description: You create a slippery grease in a 10-foot square. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

name: Guiding Bolt
description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature you choose within range. On a hit, it takes radiant damage and the next attack roll against the target has advantage.

name: Hail of Thorns
description: Thorns rain down in a 5-foot-radius around you. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take piercing damage.

name: Healing Word
description: A creature of your choice within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Hellish Rebuke
description: A creature that damages you takes fire damage as a reaction.

name: Heroism
description: You imbue yourself or one willing creature you can see with bravery. The target gains temporary hit points and is immune to fear.

name: Hex
description: You choose one creature within range. The target has disadvantage on ability checks with one ability score.

name: Hunter's Mark
description: You choose a creature within range and deal extra damage when you hit it with weapon attacks.

name: Ice Knife
description: You conjure a shard of ice and throw it at a creature. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take piercing damage.

name: Inflict Wounds
description: A creature you touch takes necrotic damage.

name: Longstrider
description: Your speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.

name: Mage Armour
description: A willing creature you touch gains a magical force that improves its AC.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits automatically and deals force damage.

name: Protection from Evil and Good
description: You protect a creature from certain types of creatures and forces.

name: Ray of Sickness
description: A ray of sickening green energy saps the health of a creature.

name: Sanctuary
description: You ward a creature within range, causing attacks against it to have disadvantage.

name: Searing Smite
description: Your weapon bursts into flames, dealing extra fire damage to the target on a hit.

name: Shield of Faith
description: You create a shimmering shield of magical force around a creature, giving it a +2 bonus to AC.

name: Sleep
description: You send creatures within range into a magical slumber. Creatures with the lowest hit points are affected first.

name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
description: You cause a creature within range to burst into fits of laughter, incapacitating it until it can make a successful Wisdom saving throw.

name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force erupts from you. Creatures within range must make a Constitution saving throw or take thunder damage.

name: Unseen Servant
description: You create an invisible, magical servant that can perform simple tasks for you.

name: Vault
description: You magically leap to a space within range.

name: Witch Bolt
description: You create a beam of crackling energy that hits a target and continues to damage it every round.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and grants you a +5 bonus to AC for the duration.

name: Acid Arrow
description: You create a magical acid arrow that deals acid damage to a target and continues to corrode them for a short time.

name: Aid
description: You bolster your allies with increased hit points, giving up to three creatures extra hit points.

name: Alter Self
description: You transform yourself in various ways, including changing your appearance or gaining swimming or breathing abilities.

name: Arcane Lock
description: You magically lock a door, chest, or similar object, making it harder to open without a specific key or magical means.

name: Blur
description: Your form shifts and blurs, making it difficult for attackers to land a blow against you.

name: Branding Smite
description: Your weapon becomes imbued with radiant energy, and your next hit deals additional radiant damage to the target and causes it to glow.

name: Cloud of Daggers
description: You create a cloud of spinning daggers in a 5-foot square. Creatures within the cloud take slashing damage.

name: Continual Flame
description: You create a magical flame that emits bright light in a 20-foot radius and does not require fuel.

name: Crown of Madness
description: You create a crown of twisted iron around a creature's head, compelling them to attack another creature.

name: Darkness
description: You create a magical area of darkness, obscuring vision and making it difficult for creatures within to see.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: You can hear the thoughts of creatures within range. You can probe deeper into their minds to gain more information.

name: Enlarge/Reduce
description: You cause a creature or object to grow or shrink, altering its size and potentially its strength or other physical properties.

name: Eruption
description: You create a burst of fire and stone, causing creatures within range to take fire damage and be knocked back.

name: Flame Blade
description: You create a blade of fire that lasts for the duration. The blade deals fire damage on a hit.

name: Flaming Sphere
description: You create a sphere of fire that you can move within range, dealing fire damage to creatures it touches.

name: Hold Person
description: You paralyze a humanoid target within range, making it unable to move or take actions.

name: Invisibility
description: You make a creature or object within range invisible.

name: Knock
description: You open a locked door, chest, or similar object by bypassing magical or mundane locks.

name: Lesser Restoration
description: You touch a creature and cure one of the following conditions: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: Misty Step
description: You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Mirror Image
description: You create illusionary duplicates of yourself to confuse attackers, making it harder for them to hit you.

name: Nystul's Magic Aura
description: You hide the magical aura of an object, making it appear as though it is not magical.

name: Pass Without Trace
description: You and your companions leave no trace of your passage, making it harder for others to track you.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: You blast a creature with a weakening ray. It deals half damage with Strength-based attacks.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You create three rays of fire and can direct them at one or more targets, dealing fire damage.

name: Shatter
description: You create a sudden loud noise and a burst of sound that damages creatures and objects within range.

name: Spider Climb
description: You grant a creature the ability to climb difficult surfaces, including walls and ceilings, without needing to make checks.

name: Spike Growth
description: You cause the ground in a 20-foot radius to become covered with sharp, spiked growths, damaging creatures that move through it.

name: Skywrite
description: You create magical writing in the sky, which can be seen for miles.

name: Suggestion
description: You suggest a course of activity to a creature, which it must follow unless it can make a Wisdom saving throw.

name: Warding Bond
description: You form a magical bond with a willing creature, granting it a bonus to AC and saving throws but also taking some of the damage it would take.

name: Web
description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webs that can entangle creatures within its area.

name: Animate Dead
description: You raise the dead as your minions, animating them to serve as skeletons or zombies under your control.

name: Bestow Curse
description: You bestow a debilitating curse on a creature, causing them to suffer a penalty on certain rolls or actions.

name: Counterspell
description: You interrupt and negate another creature's casting of a spell.

name: Dispel Magic
description: You end a spell's effect within range by negating the magic that powers it.

name: Fear
description: You create a wave of fear, causing creatures within range to become frightened and flee.

name: Fireball
description: You unleash a ball of fire that explodes in a burst of flame, dealing significant fire damage to creatures within its area.

name: Fly
description: You grant a creature the ability to fly for the duration of the spell.

name: Gaseous Form
description: You transform a creature into a cloud of mist, allowing them to pass through small openings and avoiding most physical damage.

name: Haste
description: You accelerate a creature, increasing their speed and granting them additional actions.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
description: You create a mesmerizing pattern that causes creatures within range to become charmed and incapacitated.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: You release a bolt of lightning that travels in a straight line, damaging creatures in its path.

name: Magic Circle
description: You create a magical circle that protects against certain types of creatures and can be used to contain or bind them.

name: Major Image
description: You create a realistic illusion that can mimic any object, creature, or phenomenon within the spell's parameters.

name: Misty Step
description: You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Revivify
description: You bring a creature that has died within the last minute back to life with 1 hit point.

name: Sending
description: You send a short message to a creature anywhere in the world, allowing them to respond in kind.

name: Sleet Storm
description: You create a storm of sleet that makes the area difficult to see and move through, potentially causing creatures to fall prone.

name: Slow
description: You reduce the speed and reactions of creatures in the area, making them slower to act and respond.

name: Stinking Cloud
description: You create a cloud of noxious gas that sickens creatures within it, causing them to take poison damage and become incapacitated.

name: Tongues
description: You can understand and speak any language for the duration of the spell.

name: Wall of Water
description: You create a wall of water that can block movement and provide protection from certain types of attacks.

name: Banishment
description: You banish a creature to another plane of existence. If the creature is native to the plane you're on, it is sent back to its home plane.

name: Blight
description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature, draining vitality and causing it to wither and die, dealing necrotic damage.

name: Confusion
description: You cause creatures within range to become confused, causing them to behave unpredictably and possibly harm themselves or others.

name: Dimension Door
description: You teleport yourself and willing creatures within range to a location you can visualize or describe.

name: Greater Invisibility
description: You turn yourself or a creature you touch invisible. The target can still take actions and cast spells without revealing their position.

name: Polymorph
description: You transform a creature you can see within range into a new form. The transformation lasts for the duration or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies.

name: Stoneskin
description: You grant a creature resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for the duration.

name: Wall of Fire
description: You create a wall of fire that damages creatures within its area and can serve as a barrier to block movement.

name: Cloudkill
description: A cloud of poison gas moves with the wind and deals poison damage to creatures within its area.

name: Cone of Cold
description: A blast of cold air radiates from you, freezing everything in its path and dealing cold damage to creatures caught in it.

name: Dominate Person
description: You take control of a humanoid creature within range, allowing you to dictate their actions for the duration.

name: Flame Strike
description: A vertical column of divine fire roars down to strike a target, dealing both fire and radiant damage.

name: Greater Restoration
description: You undo the effects of debilitating conditions on a creature, including exhaustion, curses, and diseases.

name: Hold Monster
description: You paralyze a creature within range, rendering it immobile and unable to act.

name: Insect Plague
description: You summon a swarm of biting insects that creates difficult terrain and deals piercing damage to creatures within its area.

name: Mass Cure Wounds
description: You channel healing energy in a wide area, restoring hit points to multiple creatures in range.

name: Telekinesis
description: You move and manipulate objects or creatures with your mind, lifting them and controlling their movement.

name: Wall of Stone
description: You create a wall of solid stone that can be shaped to suit your needs, providing cover or blocking movement.

name: Arcane Gate
description: You create a portal that connects two points within range, allowing for instant travel between them.

name: Blade Barrier
description: You create a wall of spinning blades that deals slashing damage to creatures passing through it.

name: Chain Lightning
description: You unleash a bolt of lightning that arcs from one target to another, dealing lightning damage to each creature it hits.

name: Circle of Death
description: You cause a sphere of negative energy to burst, dealing necrotic damage to all creatures in the area.

name: Create Undead
description: You raise undead creatures under your control, either as ghouls, ghasts, or mummies.

name: Disintegrate
description: A thin green ray disintegrates creatures or objects it hits, reducing them to dust.

name: True Seeing
description: You can see things as they actually are, perceiving hidden doors, illusions, and invisible creatures.

name: Heal
description: You restore a large amount of hit points to a creature, curing them of disease or blindness.
